name: End War RTS 2
description:
Compared with the first generation, End War RTS 2 transforms from 2D to 3D, which is a classic real-time strategy



End War RTS 2 is a story inspired by modern science fiction. It is mainly based on the fact that human beings started the world war in order to fight for survival resources, and the launching of nuclear bombs has become the killing means of various countries.



In the world of End War RTS 2, it is constructed by seven camps of the United States, France, Britain, Germany, Russia, Cuba and Libya. Each country's power weapon units are different, and the U.S. space carrier, Russian missile submarine and other characteristics



There are a large number of weapon units in the world, which are rich in land, sea and air. To expand your army, you need to obtain more minerals. Crazy occupation of more resources is your primary strategic goal. Build more mines, more harvesters, use metal storm

The laser tower and other defense buildings will stick to your position. The strong ones on the ground are thunder and fire tanks, long-range attack missiles, the king of the sky, the air carrier and the God's particle nd500 warship. If it is difficult, we will use strategic nuclear weapons. You are the strongest in the world

Crush your enemy and level it



End War RTS is a map generated by random parameters. It mainly uses artificial intelligence to fight against a reliable enemy. It can also be connected to the local area network and can support up to eight people to fight. Powerful artificial intelligence will use nuclear weapons to attack you and your allies, and they will choose the place in your strength set. You can also choose to be a God and watch them fight in battle

You can use the terrain editor to edit the maps that are conducive to combat and set the battle details
